snippet.title: DmC Devil May Cry - Vergil's Downfall
snippet.description:
Vergil's Downfall for DmC Devil May Cry lets you play as Dante's twin brother Vergil and explore his story, with new unlockables, leaderboards and hours of gameplay!

US fans can pre-order DmC at Gamestop now to receive Vergil's Downfall additional content as well as the Samurai weapons pack. http://bit.ly/RTKUJh 

Canadian fans can pre-order DmC at EB Games now to receive Vergil's Downfall additional content as well as the Samurai weapons pack. http://bit.ly/Qdi4oV 

Join the Fight. Visit The Order Blog and download the Eye of Dante app! http://smarturl.it/EOD

Buy DmC Devil May Cry now at http://bit.ly/DmC-preo

'Like' Devil May Cry on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/devilmaycry

Follow on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/devilmaycry

G+
http://bit.ly/DMC-G

Follow DMC on Instagram too! @devilmaycry.

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
